body:
Comment 1: 
We tried this in the run-up to Go 1.0 but pulled it because, in a nutshell, although it
made simple examples easier to read it made large composite literals harder to
understand. We felt that readability suffered. We were also worried about "style guide"
issues arguing for or against elision.

Simplest solution: don't provide the feature.

Slices are different because the type is always the same.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
